Title: Relates to temporarily exempting covered entities under the federal 340B program and comprehensive HIV special needs plans
Summary: Relates to temporarily exempting covered entities under the federal 340B program and comprehensive HIV special needs plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part FFF of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020, amending the public health law relating to extending and enhancing the Medicaid drug cap and to reduce unnecessary pharmacy benefit manager costs to the Medicaid program, in relation to temporarily exempting covered entities under the federal 340B program and comprehensive HIV special needs plans
